txt.en: In the Orc encampment at Mudmul-charâf, you espy many piles of skulls arranged into neat piles.

You have searched many of the skull-piles in Mudmul-charâf and learned that the Orcs of this area were likely raiding ancient tombs in Zelem-melek for keepsakes.\n\nThe defiling of the bones was disturbing, but you have done well to identify them. The dwarves of the expedition will be able to restore the skulls now that you have helped to clear the Orcs from this encampment.
In the Orc encampment at Mudmul-charâf, you espy many piles of skulls arranged into neat piles.
These are dwarf-skulls, likely taken in the raiding of old tombs ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Piles of skulls can be found in the Orc encampment at Mudmul-charâf.\n\nYou should search the piles of skulls to see what the Orcs have been up to.
You have searched many of the skull-piles in Mudmul-charâf and learned that the Orcs of this area were likely raiding ancient tombs in Zelem-melek for keepsakes.
